header.heading: Bingham
header.subtitle: A social running and walking group I founded for all abilities. Every Sunday morning in Bingham.

intro.body: I founded the Bingham Sunday Running Club to get more people moving, socialising, and enjoying the outdoors. Whether you're a seasoned runner or just starting your first Couch to 5K, you'll fit right in.
intro.body_2: It's not a race — it's a community. We run (and walk!) together, support each other, and finish with a smile.

what_to_expect.heading: What to Expect
what_to_expect.body: We meet every Sunday morning at 7am in Bingham. Routes vary week to week, typically covering 3-8km depending on the group. There's usually a mix of paces, so nobody gets left behind.
what_to_expect.body_2: No sign-up needed — just turn up, say hello, and join in. We're a friendly bunch.

abilities.heading: For All Abilities
items: Mixed pace groups — nobody left behind

social.heading: Stay Connected
social.body: Follow us on social media for route updates, photos, and weekly recaps. I also share tips for new runners and we celebrate milestones together.

cta.heading: See You Sunday!
cta.body: Just turn up and say hello. No sign-up, no fees — just good company and fresh air.
